item.title: Coinbase 将在新法规出台前将部分稳定币在欧洲退市
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Coinbase 周五表示，该公司将在年底前将某些稳定币在欧洲经济区退市，因为该行业正在为该地区更严格的监管做准备。【原文：Coinbase will delist certain stablecoins in the European Economic Area by year's end, the cryptocurrency exchange said on Friday, as the industry braces for tougher regulation in the region.】

item.title: 美联储在美国就业数据强劲后被认为放缓了降息步伐
item.description: 交易员周五押注，上个月就业增长的激增将使美联储放弃进一步大幅降息，而坚持渐进式降息。【原文：A surge in job growth last month will allow the Federal Reserve to eschew any further big interest-rate reductions and stick to gradual cuts going forward, traders bet on Friday.】

item.title: Meta 向 OpenAI 发起挑战，宣布可生成有声视频的新型人工智能模型
item.description: Facebook 的所有者 Meta 周五宣布，它已经建立了一个名为 Movie Gen 的新人工智能模型，可以根据用户的提示创建逼真的视频和音频片段，并声称它可以与 OpenAI 和 ElevenLabs 等领先的媒体生成初创公司的工具相媲美。【原文：Facebook owner Meta announced on Friday it had built a new AI model called Movie Gen that can create realistic-seeming video and audio clips in response to user prompts, claiming it can rival tools from leading media generation startups like OpenAI and ElevenLabs.】

item.title: Tellurian股东支持提议的12亿美元伍德赛德交易
item.description: Tellurian公司周五表示，该公司股东已投票赞成澳大利亚能源生产商伍德赛德能源集团（Woodside Energy Group）以12亿美元收购美国液化天然气开发商的提议。【原文：Tellurian shareholders have voted in favor of the U.S. LNG developer's proposed $1.2 billion acquisition by Australian energy producer Woodside Energy Group , the company said on Friday.】

item.title: 强生公司终止登革热药物研究
item.description: 强生公司（Johnson & Johnson）周五表示，将终止对其预防登革热抗病毒候选药物疗效的中期实地研究。【原文：Johnson & Johnson said on Friday it will discontinue its mid-stage field study evaluating the efficacy of its antiviral drug candidate for the prevention of dengue.】

item.title: 美国 9 月非农就业人数跳升，11 月降息 50 个基点被取消
item.description: 美国 9 月份就业增长加速，失业率从 8 月份的 4.2% 下降到 4.1%，进一步降低了美联储在今年剩余两次会议上继续大幅降息的必要性。【原文：U.S. job growth accelerated in September and the unemployment rate slipped to 4.1% from August's 4.2%, further reducing the need for the Federal Reserve to maintain large interest rate cuts at its remaining two meetings this year.】

item.title: 美国 9 月份就业增长迅猛，失业率降至 4.1
item.description: 美国 9 月份就业增长加速，失业率降至 4.1%，进一步降低了美联储在今年剩余两次会议上维持大幅降息的必要性。【原文：U.S. job growth accelerated in September and the unemployment slipped to 4.1%, further reducing the need for the Federal Reserve to maintain large interest rate cuts at its remaining two meetings this year.】

item.title: 巴西 ClearSale 公司与 Experian 旗下 Serasa 公司达成合作协议
item.description: 巴西网络安全公司 ClearSale 周五表示，它已与当地 Experian 子公司 Serasa 达成合并协议，根据协议，其所有股份将由 Serasa Experian 纳入。【原文：Brazilian cyber security firm ClearSale said on Friday it has entered into a deal to combine with local Experian subsidiary Serasa under which all of its shares will be incorporated by Serasa Experian.】

item.title: 巴西对跨国公司利润征收最低税率
item.description: 巴西官方公报的一份出版物显示，巴西政府于周四晚些时候发布了一项行政命令，对跨国公司的利润征收最低 15%的税。【原文：Brazil's government late on Thursday published an executive order that effectively rolls out a minimum 15% tax on profits of multinational corporations, a publication in the country's official gazette showed.】

item.title: 中国快递公司 BingEx 在美国首次公开募股中估值近 12 亿美元
item.description: 中国的 BingEx 周五表示，它已在美国首次公开募股中募集到 6600 万美元，使这家快递公司的估值达到 11.7 亿美元，这表明投资者的风险偏好有所恢复，监管障碍也有所缓解。【原文：China's BingEx said on Friday it had raised $66 million in its U.S. initial public offering valuing the courier delivery firm at $1.17 billion, signaling a recovery in investors' risk appetite and easing regulatory hurdles.】

item.title: ADM 将在美国大豆收获创纪录期间闲置爱荷华州大豆工厂
item.description: 谷物商告诉路透社，在美国创纪录的丰收季节，阿彻-丹尼尔斯-米德兰公司（Archer-Daniels-Midland Co）位于爱荷华州的唯一一家大豆加工厂将停产数周，这将导致喂养牲畜的豆粕供应紧张。【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland Co is idling its only soybean processing plant in Iowa for weeks in the thick of a record U.S. harvest, the grain merchant told Reuters, tightening supplies of soymeal fed to livestock.】

item.title: 精神航空股价因可能申请破产的报道而暴跌
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，超低成本航空公司 Spirit Airlines 正在与其债券持有人就可能的破产申请进行谈判，该公司股价在周五收盘前暴跌 40%。【原文：Spirit Airlines shares slumped 40% before the bell on Friday after the Wall Street Journal reported that the ultra-low-cost carrier was in talks with its bondholders about a potential bankruptcy filing.】

item.title: 投资者权衡中东风险，关键薪资数据公布前期指持稳
item.description: 周五，美国股指期货走势不温不火，因为投资者在关键的薪资数据公布前未进行重大押注，并在关注中东地缘政治紧张局势的升级。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were tepid on Friday as investors refrained from making significant bets ahead of crucial payrolls data and watched for any escalation in geopolitical tensions in the Middle East.】

item.title: 惠誉不太可能很快提高巴西的信用评级，总监称
item.description: 惠誉主权评级小组的一位主管表示，尽管巴西的经济增长好于预期，但惠誉近期不太可能提升巴西的信用评级，因为人们怀疑该国能否大幅改善公共财政状况。【原文：Fitch is unlikely to upgrade Brazil's credit rating in the near-term, despite its better-than-expected economic growth, because of doubts the country will be able to significantly improve public finances, a director in its sovereign ratings group said.】

item.title: 独家报道：文件显示：赛默飞世尔生产婴儿 RSV 药物的工厂违反了 FDA 规定
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局（FDA）的文件显示，赛默飞世尔科技公司（Thermo Fisher Scientific）旗下的一家美国最大的合同药品生产厂在过去 10 年中多次违反旨在确保药品不受污染的规定，其中包括今年的两次。【原文：One of the largest contract drug manufacturing plants in the U.S. owned by Thermo Fisher Scientific over the past 10 years has repeatedly breached rules meant to ensure drugs are free of contamination, FDA documents show, including twice this year.】

item.title: 美国就业报告可能巩固或颠覆美联储减息四分之一个百分点的 "基本方案
item.description: 在美国联邦储备委员会官员的最新预测和最近的公开评论中，整体经济被认为保持稳健，但就业市场被认为正在疲软，并成为一个日益令人担忧的问题。【原文：In U.S. Federal Reserve officials' latest projections and recent public commentary, the overall economy is seen remaining in solid shape but the job market is seen as weakening and a subject of increasingly intense concern.】

item.title: 由于零部件短缺，Rivian 下调了年产量预期
item.description: Rivian 周五表示，该公司下调了全年产量预期，第三季度的汽车交付量低于分析师预期，因为这家初创公司正努力应对零部件短缺和电动汽车需求增长放缓的问题。【原文：Rivian said on Friday it slashed its full-year production forecast and delivered fewer vehicles in the third quarter than analysts had expected, as the startup grapples with a parts shortage and slowing growth in electric-vehicle demand.】

item.title: 早间竞标：港口罢工结束，就业和石油成为主旋律
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: Alphabet 旗下 Waymo 将利用现代电动汽车扩大机器人出租车队规模
item.description: 随着 Waymo 在美国的扩张，Alphabet 旗下的 Waymo 公司周五表示，其机器人出租车队将增加韩国现代汽车公司生产的电动汽车。【原文：Alphabet's Waymo will add electric vehicles from South Korea's Hyundai Motor to its robotaxi fleet, the companies said on Friday, as Waymo expands in the United States.】

item.title: 美国监管机构对超过 36 万辆福特 SUV 制动失灵展开调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周五表示，已开始对美国368,309辆福特Edge汽车因后制动软管故障导致制动失灵的问题进行初步评估。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Friday it has opened a preliminary evaluation into 368,309 Ford Edge vehicles in the United States over loss of braking caused by rear brake hose failure.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Seven & i 考虑在首次公开募股前出售超市股份
item.description: 两位消息人士称，日本 Seven & i 控股公司正考虑在计划上市前出售其超市业务部门的股份。【原文：Japan's Seven & i Holdings is considering selling a stake in its supermarket unit ahead of a planned listing of the business, two sources said, as the 7-Eleven owner aims to speed up an overhaul after rejecting a takeover from Alimentation Couche-Tard .】

item.title: 在与 Meta 公司的隐私权纠纷中，欧盟最高法院支持活动家施雷姆斯的观点
item.description: 欧洲最高法院周五在奥地利隐私活动家 Max Schrems 与 Meta Platforms 公司的隐私权纠纷案中支持他的观点。【原文：Europe's top court on Friday sided with Austrian privacy activist Max Schrems in his privacy dispute with Meta Platforms .】

item.title: 美国港口罢工凸显工会大敌：自动化
item.description: 美国东海岸和墨西哥湾沿岸的码头工人罢工于本周四结束，这次罢工中断了美国大部分的远洋运输，但导致整个美国大陆劳工动荡的一个关键问题--自动化的日益使用--仍未得到解决。【原文：A strike by dockworkers on the U.S. East Coast and Gulf Coast that disrupted much of the nation's ocean shipping this week ended on Thursday, but a key issue driving labor unrest across the continent - the growing use of automation - was unresolved.】

item.title: 法庭文件显示，俄罗斯对壳牌公司提起诉讼
item.description: 周五的法庭文件显示，俄罗斯总检察长已对能源巨头壳牌石油公司的多个部门提起诉讼。【原文：Russia's Prosecutor General has filed a lawsuit against a number of energy major Shell's units, court documents showed on Friday.】

item.title: 日本央行加息计划面临政治难题
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫提高最低借贷成本的努力面临新的挑战，因为日元反弹和新政治领导层对宽松货币政策的偏好提高了加息的门槛。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda's efforts to lift rock-bottom borrowing costs face fresh challenges as a yen rebound and the new political leadership's preference for loose monetary policy raise the hurdle for rate hikes.】

item.title: 预算困境加剧之际，马克龙与华尔街的会谈内幕
item.description: 消息人士本周透露，法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）已向美国高层金融家坦诚地评估了法国的财政困境，并指出了即将到来的增税可能性，以平息人们对法国赤字缺口的担忧。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron has given top U.S. financiers a candid assessment of his country's financial woes, flagging the potential for looming tax increases, sources said this week, in an effort to tamp down concerns over France's gaping deficit.】

item.title: 早间竞价中东紧张局势推动油价上涨
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 日经新闻》称，Seven & i 将于年底前开始出售超市多数股权
item.description: 据《日经商业日报》周五报道，日本 Seven & i 控股公司计划为其超市业务（包括旗舰企业伊藤洋华堂）的多数股权寻找买家，该进程最早将于今年年底启动。【原文：Japan's Seven & i Holdings plans to seek buyers for a majority stake in its supermarket businesses, including its flagship Ito-Yokado, with the process to begin as early as the end of this year, Nikkei business daily reported on Friday.】

item.title: 美国港口罢工结束，但清理船舶长龙仍需时日
item.description: 码头工人和港口运营商达成工资协议，解决了该行业近半个世纪以来最大的停工事件，但清理货物积压仍需时日。【原文：Dockworkers and port operators reached a wage deal to settle the industry's biggest work stoppage in nearly half a century, but clearing the cargo backlog will take time.】

item.title: 预计美国 9 月份就业将温和增长
item.description: 9 月份，美国经济可能保持了温和的就业增长速度，而失业率预计将稳定在 4.2%，这将进一步降低美联储在今年最后两次会议上大幅降息的必要性。【原文：The U.S. economy likely maintained a moderate pace of job growth in September while the unemployment rate is expected to have held steady at 4.2%, which would further reduce the need for the Federal Reserve to deliver large interest rate cuts in its final two meetings of the year.】
